Chocolate Coffee Jelly Drink ☆ チョコレートコーヒージェリードリンクの作り方,"Jul 26, 2019",10017,109,1457240,"No music version : https://youtu.be/dHI3VYbhDcM-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:40ml espresso (2 shots)420ml water3/4 tsp agar powder2 tbsp coconut sugar80g cacao paste500ml almond milk40ml maple syrup400ml coconut milkNO2 whip cream chargerInstructions:1. put espresso, water, agar powder and coconut sugar together in a sauce pan and gently bring to a boil.2. pour the mixture into a tin and leave it in a fridge.3. put cacao paste, almond milk and maple syrup in a sauce pan and warm it up on a low heat until cacao paste melts.4. prepare coconut whip cream with cream charger.5. put coffee jelly, cacao drink and coconut whip cream in a glass.6. Enjoy!-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」エスプレッソ 40ml水 420ml粉寒天 小さじ3/4パームシュガー 大さじ2カカオマス 80g濃いアーモンドミルクほんのり黒糖味 500mlメープルシロップ 40mlココナッツミルク 400ml窒素クリームチャージャー 1本「作り方」１、エスプレッソ、水、粉寒天、パームシュガーを鍋に入れ、沸騰直前まで温めます。２、型に流し入れ、冷蔵庫で冷やします。３、カカオマス、アーモンドミルク、メープルシロップを鍋に入れ、カカオマスが溶けるまで弱火で温めます。４、ココナッツクリームを窒素クリームチャージャーで作ります。５、ガラスのカップに盛りつけます。６、エンジョーイ！-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.comInstagram：@peaceful_cuisineFacebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Other Channel : https://www.youtube.com/c/RyoyaTakashimaApp : https://play.google.com/store/apps/de...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7SIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z] / FE 90mm F2.8 Macro G OSS [SEL90M28G] / FE 24-70mm F2.8 GM [SEL2470GM]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro+Monitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Slider : iFootage Shark Slider MiniEdit : Adobe Premiere Pro CCMusic : This is Love by Dan Phillipson (https://www.premiumbeat.com/royalty-f...)-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
[No Music] How to make Chocolate Coffee Jelly Drink,"Jul 26, 2019",14283,105,390885,"With Music : https://youtu.be/gVaCRxEYp4E-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:40ml espresso (2 shots)420ml water3/4 tsp agar powder2 tbsp coconut sugar80g cacao paste500ml almond milk40ml maple syrup400ml coconut milkNO2 whip cream chargerInstructions:1. put espresso, water, agar powder and coconut sugar together in a sauce pan and gently bring to a boil.2. pour the mixture into a tin and leave it in a fridge.3. put cacao paste, almond milk and maple syrup in a sauce pan and warm it up on a low heat until cacao paste melts.4. prepare coconut whip cream with cream charger.5. put coffee jelly, cacao drink and coconut whip cream in a glass.6. Lilikoi Cheese Cake (vegan) ☆ リリコイチーズケーキの作り方,"May 14, 2019",13613,99,2179931,"No Music versionhttps://youtu.be/_uBlyk83OF8Nutiva Organic Coconut Oil Butter Flavorhttps://iherb.co/roNLHP9R-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:for the crust:120g almond30g coconut flake30g cacao powder30g sweetenerfor the filling:200g cashew nuts120g lilikoi juice180g water100g coconut oil100g sweetenercorn flowerInstructions:1. soak almonds at least 8 hours. 2. make lilikoi juice.3. put all the ingredients for the filling in a blender and blend well.4. put all the ingredients for the crust in a food processor and make them into small pieces.5. press the crust mix into a tart pan.6. pour the filling and sprinkle corn flowers.7. leave it in a fridge for 4 hours.**I used water for the filling just because I didn't have enough passion fruits. If you could get them a lot, try to use 300g juice instead of 120g juice and 180g water. I guarantee it's gonna be much more tasty.-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」クラスト：アーモンド　120gココナッツフレーク　30gカカオパウダー　30g甘味料　30gフィリング：カシューナッツ　200gリリコイジュース　120g水　180gココナッツオイル　100g甘味料　100gコーンフラワー　適量「作り方」１、アーモンドを８時間浸水します。２、リリコイジュースを作ります。３、フィリングの材料をブレンダーに滑らかになるまでかけます。４、クラスト部分の材料を全てフードプロセッサーで細かくします。５、タルト生地にクラストを敷き詰めます。６、フィリングを流し込み、コーンフラワーを飾り付けます。７、冷蔵庫で４時間ほど冷やします。※フィリングには水を加えていますが、パッションフルーツがたくさん手に入った場合は、リリコイジュース３００g（水１８０gを加えずに）でフィリングを作った方が美味しいので、試してみてくださいね。-----------------------------------------------------------------------Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.comInstagram：@peaceful_cuisineFacebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Other Channel : https://www.youtube.com/c/RyoyaTakashimaApp : https://play.google.com/store/apps/de...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7SIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro+Monitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Edit : Adobe Premiere Pro CCMusic : Sweet memories by Dan Phillipson (https://www.premiumbeat.com/royalty-f...)-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
[No Music] How to make Lilikoi Cheese Cake,"May 14, 2019",12845,109,390885,"Nutiva Organic Coconut Oil Butter Flavorhttps://iherb.co/roNLHP9R-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:for the crust:120g almond30g coconut flake30g cacao powder30g sweetenerfor the filling:200g cashew nuts120g lilikoi juice180g water100g coconut oil100g sweetenercorn flowerInstructions:1. soak almonds at least 8 hours. 2. make lilikoi juice.3. put all the ingredients for the filling in a blender and blend well.4. put all the ingredients for the crust in a food processor and make them into small pieces.5. press the crust mix into a tart pan.6. pour the filling and sprinkle corn flowers.7. leave it in a fridge for 4 hours.**I used water for the filling just because I didn't have enough passion fruits. If you could get them a lot, try to use 300g juice instead of 120g juice and 180g water. I guarantee it's gonna be much more tasty.-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」クラスト：アーモンド　120gココナッツフレーク　30gカカオパウダー　30g甘味料　30gフィリング：カシューナッツ　200gリリコイジュース　120g水　180gココナッツオイル　100g甘味料　100gコーンフラワー　適量「作り方」１、アーモンドを８時間浸水します。２、リリコイジュースを作ります。３、フィリングの材料をブレンダーに滑らかになるまでかけます。４、クラスト部分の材料を全てフードプロセッサーで細かくします。５、タルト生地にクラストを敷き詰めます。６、フィリングを流し込み、コーンフラワーを飾り付けます。７、冷蔵庫で４時間ほど冷やします。※フィリングには水を加えていますが、パッションフルーツがたくさん手に入った場合は、リリコイジュース３００g（水１８０gを加えずに）でフィリングを作った方が美味しいので、試してみてくださいね。-----------------------------------------------------------------------Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.comInstagram：@peaceful_cuisineFacebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Other Channel : https://www.youtube.com/c/RyoyaTakashimaApp : https://play.google.com/store/apps/de...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7SIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro+Monitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Edit : Adobe Premiere Pro CC-----------------------------------------------------------------------"

Bamboo Shoot Rice ☆ 竹の子ご飯の作り方,"Apr 10, 2019",7172,336,153936,"*Please note* Do not try this recipe at home unless you have a chance to get Shirako Bamboo shoots.If you are using normal bamboo shoots, please get rid of all the harshness and bitterness in bamboo shoots by boiling it for an hour beforehand.※今回はたまたま朝市で白子竹の子を入手しましたので、アク抜き処理が浸水するだけになっていますが、通常の竹の子を使用する場合は米ぬかで茹でるなどちゃんと下処理をしてください。-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:Shirako bamboo shoots230g rice80g sticky ricea small sheet of kombu360ml water2 tbsp sake1 tbsp soy sauce1/2 tsp saltInstructions:1. peel the bamboo and soak overnight.2. soak rice for a couple of hours.3. make Dashi by soaking kombu in 360ml water.4. combine all the ingredients together in a pan or pot and bring to a boil.5. cook 15min on very low heat.6. enjoy!-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」白子竹の子　１個お米　1.5合もち米　0.5合昆布　適量水　360ml酒　大さじ2醤油　大さじ1塩　小さじ1/2「作り方」１、白子竹の子の皮を剥き、一晩浸水させます。２、お米を数時間、浸水させます。３、昆布は360mlのお水でだしをとります。４、全ての材料を鍋に入れ、沸騰させます。５、極弱火で15分ほど炊きます。６、エンジョーイ！-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.comInstagram：@peaceful_cuisineFacebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Other Channel : https://www.youtube.com/c/RyoyaTakashimaApp : https://play.google.com/store/apps/de...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7SIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro+Monitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Edit : Adobe Premiere Pro CCMusic : a moment of clarity by Shaun Frearson (https://www.premiumbeat.com/royalty-f...)-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
[No Music] How to make Bamboo Shoot Rice,"Apr 10, 2019",4260,65,100046,"*Please note* Do not try this recipe at home unless you have a chance to get Shirako Bamboo shoots.If you are using normal bamboo shoots, please get rid of all the harshness and bitterness in bamboo shoots by boiling it for an hour beforehand.※今回はたまたま朝市で白子竹の子を入手しましたので、アク抜き処理が浸水するだけになっていますが、通常の竹の子を使用する場合は米ぬかで茹でるなどちゃんと下処理をしてください。-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:Shirako bamboo shoots230g rice80g sticky ricea small sheet of kombu360ml water2 tbsp sake1 tbsp soy sauce1/2 tsp saltInstructions:1. peel the bamboo and soak overnight.2. soak rice for a couple of hours.3. make Dashi by soaking kombu in 360ml water.4. combine all the ingredients together in a pan or pot and bring to a boil.5. cook 15min on very low heat.6. enjoy!-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」白子竹の子　１個お米　1.5合もち米　0.5合昆布　適量水　360ml酒　大さじ2醤油　大さじ1塩　小さじ1/2「作り方」１、白子竹の子の皮を剥き、一晩浸水させます。２、お米を数時間、浸水させます。３、昆布は360mlのお水でだしをとります。４、全ての材料を鍋に入れ、沸騰させます。５、極弱火で15分ほど炊きます。６、エンジョーイ！-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free Kuromame -simmered black beans- ☆ 黒豆の作り方,"Dec 28, 2018",3804,114,465863,"鉄玉子 // iron egghttps://amzn.to/2BHD5SQ落とし蓋 22cm // a drop lidhttps://amzn.to/2BN9SWLタイガークラウン クッキング ガスマット(気持ち弱火にできるやつ)https://amzn.to/2BKCMXK堀金箔粉株式会社 // gold leafhttp://www.horikin.co.jp-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:250g black beans1500ml waterone iron egg (optional for making beans more black)200g cane sugar1 tsp soy saucesome gold leaves(optional)Instructions:1. soak black beans with 1500ml water for 6 hours2. add cane sugar, iron egg and soy sauce and bring it to a boil.3. skim the scum4. put a drop lid and a lid. simmer on a very low heat for 4 hours.5. chill it, take the iron egg out, sprinkle some gold leaves on top.6. Enjoy!-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」黒豆　250g水　1500ml鉄玉子　1個（もしくは錆びた釘数本か鉄鍋で煮る。なくてもOK）きび砂糖　200g醤油　小さじ1金箔　少量「作り方」１、黒豆を1500mlの水で6時間浸水します。２、きび砂糖、鉄玉子、醤油を加えて沸騰させます。３、アクを取り除きます。４、落とし蓋と蓋をして極弱火で4時間煮ます。５、冷ましてから鉄玉子を取り出し、器に盛って金箔をまぶします。６、えんジョーイ！-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.comInstagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Other Channel : https://www.youtube.com/c/RyoyaTakashimaApp : https://play.google.com/store/apps/de...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RII / Sony A7SIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro+Monitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Edit : Adobe Premiere Pro CCMusic : Sometime Soon by Cool Cat Music (https://www.premiumbeat.com/royalty-f...)-----------------------------------------------------------------------"

Enjoy!-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」黒豆　250g水　1500ml鉄玉子　1個（もしくは錆びた釘数本か鉄鍋で煮る。なくてもOK）きび砂糖　200g醤油　小さじ1金箔　少量「作り方」１、黒豆を1500mlの水で6時間浸水します。２、きび砂糖、鉄玉子、醤油を加えて沸騰させます。３、アクを取り除きます。４、落とし蓋と蓋をして極弱火で4時間煮ます。５、冷ましてから鉄玉子を取り出し、器に盛って金箔をまぶします。６、えんジョーイ！-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.comInstagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Other Channel : https://www.youtube.com/c/RyoyaTakashimaApp : https://play.google.com/store/apps/de...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RII / Sony A7SIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro+Monitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Edit : Adobe Premiere Pro CC-----------------------------------------------------------------------"

Enjoy!-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」水　300mlアーモンドミルク　250mlほうじ茶　10g（大さじ4）甘味料　大さじ2〜4「作り方」１、水を沸騰させ、ほうじ茶を入れて２分間蒸らします。２、アーモンドミルクを加え、沸騰直前まで温めて火を止め、さらに２分間蒸らします。３、茶葉を取り除き、お好みで甘味料を加えます。４、エンジョーイ！-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.comInstagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Other Channel : https://www.youtube.com/c/RyoyaTakashimaApp : https://play.google.com/store/apps/de...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RII / Sony A7SIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro+Monitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Slider : Libec ALX S8 KITEdit : Adobe Premiere Pro CC-----------------------------------------------------------------------"

Tacos (vegan) ☆ タコスの作り方,"Nov 10, 2018",13039,231,266028,"No music version is here :)https://youtu.be/1a22Mk4jOl4-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:200g tomatoes50g onion2 cloves garlicsome chili pepper1/2 tsp salt200g tempeh1 tsp ginger2 tbsp soy sauce200g masa240ml watera pinch of salt50g onion10g corianderInstructions:1. grill or bake tomatoes, onion, chili pepper and garlic until they burn a little bit.2. put them into a container of blender and add salt. then blend.3. cut tempeh into a bite size. grate ginger and add soy sauce. soak tempeh into the sauce.4. deep fry tempeh until golden brown.5. mix masa, water and salt to make masa dough. divide into 10 pieces.6. bake tortilla both side.7. dice onion and coriander and toss together.8. put everything together and squeeze lime on top.9. enjoy!-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」トマト　200gたまねぎ　50gにんにく　2つ唐辛子　適量塩　小さじ1/2テンペ　200g生姜　一片醤油　大さじ2マサ　200g水　240ml塩　ひとつまみたまねぎ　50gシラントロ　10g「作り方」１、トマト、たまねぎ、にんにく、唐辛子を焦げ目が着くまでグリルします。２、ブレンダーでソース状にします。塩で味を整えます。３、テンペを一口大に切り、すりおろした生姜と醤油に浸けます。４、テンペを揚げます。（2〜3分）５、マサ、水、塩を混ぜ、10等分します。６、トルティーヤを両面焼きます。７、たまねぎとシラントロをみじん切りにして合わせておきます。８、全ての材料を盛り付けして、ライムを絞ったら出来上がりです。９、エンジョーイ！※必ず、マサを使用してください。コーンフラワーでもコーングリッツでもコーンスターチでもコーンミールでもありません。灰汁でトウモロコシを煮てあるのがマサで、マサ以外のトウモロコシの粉でコーントルティーヤを作っても必ず失敗します。気をつけてね！-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free [No Music] How to make Tacos,"Nov 10, 2018",9964,208,593086,"Ingredients:200g tomatoes50g onion2 cloves garlicsome chili pepper1/2 tsp salt200g tempeh1 tsp ginger2 tbsp soy sauce200g masa240ml watera pinch of salt50g onion10g corianderInstructions:1. grill or bake tomatoes, onion, chili pepper and garlic until they burn a little bit.2. put them into a container of blender and add salt. then blend.3. cut tempeh into a bite size. grate ginger and add soy sauce. soak tempeh into the sauce.4. deep fry tempeh until golden brown.5. mix masa, water and salt to make masa dough. divide into 10 pieces.6. bake tortilla both side.7. dice onion and coriander and toss together.8. put everything together and squeeze lime on top.9. enjoy!-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」トマト　200gたまねぎ　50gにんにく　2つ唐辛子　適量塩　小さじ1/2テンペ　200g生姜　一片醤油　大さじ2マサ　200g水　240ml塩　ひとつまみたまねぎ　50gシラントロ　10g「作り方」１、トマト、たまねぎ、にんにく、唐辛子を焦げ目が着くまでグリルします。２、ブレンダーでソース状にします。塩で味を整えます。３、テンペを一口大に切り、すりおろした生姜と醤油に浸けます。４、テンペを揚げます。（2〜3分）５、マサ、水、塩を混ぜ、10等分します。６、トルティーヤを両面焼きます。７、たまねぎとシラントロをみじん切りにして合わせておきます。８、全ての材料を盛り付けして、ライムを絞ったら出来上がりです。９、エンジョーイ！※必ず、マサを使用してください。コーンフラワーでもコーングリッツでもコーンスターチでもコーンミールでもありません。灰汁でトウモロコシを煮てあるのがマサで、マサ以外のトウモロコシの粉でコーントルティーヤを作っても必ず失敗します。気をつけてね！-----------------------------------------------------------------------I Black Rice Pudding (vegan) ☆ ブラックライスプディングの作り方,"Oct 10, 2018",7405,47,1876011,"Ingredients:1 cup black rice2 cups water1 cup coconut milka pinch of salt3 tbsp palm sugaryour choice of fruitcoconut flakeInstructions:1. Rinse and drain black rice.2. combine black rice, water, coconut milk and salt in a sauce pan, then bring to a boil, cover and simmer for 45 minutes.3. let it cool and serve with your choice of fruit and additional coconut milk.-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」黒米　１カップ水　２カップココナッツミルク　１カップ塩　少々パームシュガー　大さじ３好みのフルーツココナッツフレーク「作り方」１、黒米を洗います。２、黒米、水、ココナッツミルク、塩を鍋に入れ沸騰させ、蓋をして45分間煮ます。３、少し冷ましてから、好みのフルーツやココナッツフレークなどで飾りつけして出来上がりです。さらにココナッツミルクをかけても美味しいです。-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.comInstagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Other Channel : https://www.youtube.com/c/RyoyaTakashimaApp : https://play.google.com/store/apps/de...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7SIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro+Monitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Edit : Adobe Premiere Pro CCMusic by Epidemic Sound (http://www.epidemicsound.com)-----------------------------------------------------------------------"

Orange Mocha Scones (vegan GF) ☆ オレンジモカスコーンの作り方,"Jan 24, 2018",10157,90,325639,"KitchenAid official website http://www.kitchenaid.com/KitchenAid Artisan Mini Series Tilt-Head Stand Mixer, 3.5 quarthttp://amzn.to/2rFYeeFKitchenAid All Metal Grain Mill Attachmenthttp://amzn.to/2FdRZjQLa Pavoni Romanticahttp://amzn.to/2n8n6qA-----------------------------------------------------------------------キッチンエイドジャパン　公式ウェブサイト　http://www.kitchenaid.jp/ja_JP/キッチンエイド　スタンドミキサーミニ　マットブラックhttp://amzn.to/2n9Srtbキッチンエイド　アタッチメント　グレインミルhttp://amzn.to/2Bs4XItラ・パボーニhttp://amzn.to/2E8a0krマッツァーミニhttp://amzn.to/2FcaGV9-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:150g chickpea150g quinoa150g Coconut milk2 shots(40ml) espresso60g Oil50g cane sugar1 tbsp baking powder100g dark chocolateorange peelInstructions:1. ground chickpea and quinoa as fine as possible.2. make 2 shots of espresso, or really bitter 40 ml coffee instead.3. place all the wet ingredients into a bowl.4. add all the remaining dry ingredients and mix well.5. divide the dough into 8 equal pieces and shape them into whatever you like.6. bake at 200C/390F for 20 minutes.-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」ひよこ豆　150gキヌア　150gココナッツミルク　150gエスプレッソ　2ショットオイル　60gきび砂糖　50gベーキングパウダー　大さじ1ダークチョコレート　100gオレンジピール　１個分「作り方」１、ひよこ豆とキヌアを粉状に挽きます。２、エスプレッソ２ショット、もしくは濃いコーヒー40mlを作ります。３、オイル、ココナッツミルク、エスプレッソをボウルに入れます。４、残りの全ての材料をボウルに加えます。５、生地を８等分して、好きな形に成形します。６、200℃のオーブンで20分焼きます。-----------------------------------------------------------------------I (JPN)http://sunfoodsuperfoods.jp/?pid=7508...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:300g green lentils300g kidney beans2 tbsp cumin seeds3 tbsp coconut oil6 cooked.4. pour coconut milk and water.5. add coriander, turmeric, salt and cayenne pepper.-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」緑レンズ豆　300g金時豆　300gクミンシード　大さじ２ココナッツオイル　大さじ３にんにく　6つ玉ねぎ　600gきのこ　300gレンコン　150gココナッツミルク　４缶水　800mlコリアンダーパウダー　大さじ２ターメリック　大さじ２塩　大さじ３カイエンペッパー　小さじ1/2「作り方」１、緑レンズ豆と金時豆を６時間浸水してから圧力鍋で５分ほど調理する。２、クミンシードを軽く炒る。３、ココナッツオイル、にんにく、玉ねぎ、レンコン、きのこを加えて火が通るまで炒める。４、ココナッツミルクと水を加える。５、コリアンダー、ターメリック、塩、カイエンペッパーを加える。-----------------------------------------------------------------------I Sakura Anpan (vegan) ☆ 桜あんぱんの作り方,"Jul 14, 2017",11895,88,593086,"This was so much fun to make! Give it a try if you like baking ;)[No Music] How to Make Sakura Anpanhttps://youtu.be/OkRxHwMrYvg-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:For the dough:300g bread flour30g oil20g cane sugar3g salt150g water5g beet3g dried yeastFor the sakura an paste:150g navy beans100g cane sugar15g pickled cherry blossomsInstructions:1. soak navy beans overnight. bring to a boil.2. add water a few times, drain and rinse. bring to a boil again and keep simmering until tender. add water as needed.3. blend beet and water with a blender. then strain. add dried yeast.4. combine all the ingredients for the dough and knead well.5. let it ferment until it doubles in volume.6. strain the navy beans. add cane sugar and pickled cherry blossoms(rinse and drain beforehand).7. keep heating until you get the desired texture.8. divide the dough into 10 equal pieces.9. roll out the dough into round shape. put sakura an paste and wrap it with the dough(use 20g sakura an paste for each)10. make a slit evenly at five points. make it into sakura shape.11. let it ferment for 30 - 60 mins12. bake at 320F/160C for 12 mins-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」パン生地強力粉　300gオイル　30gきび砂糖　20g塩　3g水　150gビーツ  5gドライイースト　3g桜餡手亡豆　150gきび砂糖　100g桜の塩漬け　15g「作り方」１、手亡豆を一晩浸水し、鍋に移して沸騰させます。２、差し水を数回して、一度茹で汁を捨てて水ですすぎます。新しい水でまた沸騰させ、柔らかくなるまで弱火で煮ます。必要に応じて水は足してください。３、ビーツと水をブレンダーにかけ、漉してからドライイーストを加えます。４、パン生地の全ての材料を混ぜ合わせ、よく捏ねます。５、二倍に膨らむまで一次発酵させます。６、煮た手亡豆を裏ごしします。水にさらした桜の塩漬けときび砂糖を加えます。７、適度な固さになるまで煮詰めます。８、パン生地を１０等分します。９、生地を丸型にのばし、桜餡を乗せて包みます。（桜餡は１つ20gずつ）１０、５箇所に切れ込みを入れ、桜の花の形に成形します。１１、３０〜６０分ほど二次発酵させます。１２、１６０℃で１２分ほど焼きます。-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.comInstagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/c/RyoyaTakashima-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro RycoteMonitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7/ RRS TP-243 Ground-Level TripodSlider : Libec ALX S8 KITSoftware : Adobe Premiere Pro CCMusic : Mellow Acoustic Piano 14 - Johan HynynenMusic by Epidemic Sound (http://www.epidemicsound.com)-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
[No Music] How to Make Sakura Anpan,"Jul 14, 2017",12850,149,574686,"-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:For the dough:300g bread flour30g oil20g cane sugar3g salt150g water5g beet3g dried yeastFor the sakura an paste:150g navy beans100g cane sugar15g pickled cherry blossomsInstructions:1. soak navy beans overnight. bring to a boil.2. add water a few times, drain and rinse. bring to a boil again and keep simmering until tender. add water as needed.3. blend beet and water with a blender. then strain. add dried yeast.4. combine all the ingredients for the dough and knead well.5. let it ferment until it doubles in volume.6. strain the navy beans. add cane sugar and pickled cherry blossoms(rinse and drain beforehand).7. keep heating until you get the desired texture.8. divide the dough into 10 equal pieces.9. roll out the dough into round shape. put sakura an paste and wrap it with the dough(use 20g sakura an paste for each)10. make a slit evenly at five points. make it into sakura shape.11. let it ferment for 30 - 60 mins12. bake at 320F/160C for 12 mins-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」パン生地強力粉　300gオイル　30gきび砂糖　20g塩　3g水　150gビーツ  5gドライイースト　3g桜餡手亡豆　150gきび砂糖　100g桜の塩漬け　15g「作り方」１、手亡豆を一晩浸水し、鍋に移して沸騰させます。２、差し水を数回して、一度茹で汁を捨てて水ですすぎます。新しい水でまた沸騰させ、柔らかくなるまで弱火で煮ます。必要に応じて水は足してください。３、ビーツと水をブレンダーにかけ、漉してからドライイーストを加えます。４、パン生地の全ての材料を混ぜ合わせ、よく捏ねます。５、二倍に膨らむまで一次発酵させます。６、煮た手亡豆を裏ごしします。水にさらした桜の塩漬けときび砂糖を加えます。７、適度な固さになるまで煮詰めます。８、パン生地を１０等分します。９、生地を丸型にのばし、桜餡を乗せて包みます。（桜餡は１つ20gずつ）１０、５箇所に切れ込みを入れ、桜の花の形に成形します。１１、３０〜６０分ほど二次発酵させます。１２、１６０℃で１２分ほど焼きます。-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.comInstagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/c/RyoyaTakashima-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro RycoteMonitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7/ RRS TP-243 Ground-Level TripodSlider : Libec ALX S8 KITSoftware : Adobe Premiere Pro CC-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
Green Curry (vegan) ☆ グリーンカレーの作り方,"Jul 2, 2017",13341,235,319055,-----------------------------------------------------------------------レモングラスはここで買いました！宮古島産無農薬レモングラス１kghttp://paripari.art-de-nature.com/ite...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:For the green curry paste:20 green chili peppers (40g)100g onion40g lemon grass20g coriander10g ginger8 cloves of garlic (40g)1 tsp coriander seeds1 tsp cumin seeds5 - 6 kaffir lime leaves2 tsp salt2 cans of coconut milk (800ml)400ml water2 tbsp palm sugar4 tbsp soy sauce200g egg plant100g green beans100g shimeji mushroom300g deep fried tofusome basil leavesInstructions:1. blend all the ingredients for the green curry paste with a blender until smooth.2. pour a can of coconut milk into a pan or a pot. add green curry paste as well.3. bring to a boil on medium heat.4. add all the rest of the ingredients except for tofu and basil leaves. keep simmering until all the vegetables are cooked.5. add deep fried tofu and basil.6. Enjoy!-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」グリーンカレーペースト青唐辛子　20本(種取ったあと40g)コリアンダーシード　小さじ1クミンシード　小さじ1ニンニク　8つ(40g)生姜　10g玉ねぎ　100g塩　小さじ2パクチー根付き　20gこぶみかんの葉　5〜6枚レモングラス　40gココナッツミルク　2缶（800ml）水　400mlパームシュガー　大さじ2醤油　大さじ4なす　200gいんげん　100gぶなしめじ　100g厚揚げ　300gバジルの葉　適量「作り方」１、グリーンカレーペーストの全ての材料を、ミルサーやブレンダーなどで滑らかになるまで混ぜます。２、ココナッツミルク１缶とグリーンカレーペーストを鍋に入れます。３、中火で沸騰させて、そのまま数分間煮ます。４、厚揚げとバジル以外の全ての材料を加え、野菜に火が通るまで弱火で煮ます。５、厚揚げとバジルを加えます。６、エンジョーイ！-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro RycoteMonitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7/ RRS TP-243 Ground-Level TripodSoftware : Adobe Premiere Pro CCMusic by Epidemic Sound (http://www.epidemicsound.com)-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Ethiopian Hummus ☆ エチオピアンフムスの作り方,"Jun 12, 2017",10115,152,157861,"-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:80g sunflower seeds200g chickpea(about 550g after boiling)2 tbsp olive oilzest of a lemon3 tbsp lemon juice1 tsp jalapeno (of course you can add more!)2 cloves of garlic1 tsp salt1 tsp berbere spice[Berbere Spice]10g dried chili peppers(abou1 - 2 tbsp chili powder)2 tbsp paprica powder1 tsp salt1 tsp coriander1/2 tsp dried ginger(I forgot to add in the video. lol)1/2 tsp fenugreek1/2 tsp cardamom1/2 nutmeg1/2 all spice1/4 cloveInstructions:1. soak chickpeas for 6 hours, then cook with pressure cooker for 5 min.2. toast sunflower seeds.3. put all the ingredients for berbere spice except for nutmeg in a grinder then make it into powder. add grated nutmeg.4. combine all the ingredients together in a food processor and process. add water if needed.5. serve with pita or whatever you like ;)-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」サンフラワーシード（生）　80gひよこ豆　200g(茹でたら550g)オリーブオイル　大さじ２レモンの皮　レモン１個分レモン果汁　大さじ３ハラペーニョ　小さじ１（オプショナル）ベルベルスパイス　小さじ1〜2にんにく　2つ塩　小さじ1◎ベルベルスパイス◎チリパウダー　大さじ1〜2（唐辛子１０g）パプリカパウダー　大さじ2塩　小さじ1コリアンダーパウダー　小さじ1ジンジャーパウダー　小さじ1/2（動画では入れ忘れました。笑）フェヌグリークパウダー　小さじ1/2カルダモンパウダー　小さじ1/2ナツメグパウダー　小さじ1/2オールスパイスパウダー　小さじ1/2クローブパウダー　小さじ1/4「作り方」１、ひよこ豆を６時間浸水してから圧力鍋で５分ほど圧をかけます。２、サンフラワーシードを炒ります。３、ベルベルスパイスミックスのナツメグ以外の材料を全てミルサーで粉状にします。削ったナツメグを最後に加えます。４、全ての材料をフードプロセッサーで撹拌します。水を加えてテクスチャーを調整してください。５、ピタパンで食べると美味しいよ！（ピタパンは全体に水を吹きかけてからトースターで焼くと焼きたてみたいになります♪・・・知ってるか。笑）-----------------------------------------------------------------------I [No Music] How to make Ethiopian Hummus,"Jun 12, 2017",7225,91,256741,"-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:80g sunflower seeds200g chickpea(about 550g after boiling)2 tbsp olive oilzest of a lemon3 tbsp lemon juice1 tsp jalapeno (of course you can add more!)2 cloves of garlic1 tsp salt1 tsp berbere spice[Berbere Spice]10g dried chili peppers(abou1 - 2 tbsp chili powder)2 tbsp paprica powder1 tsp salt1 tsp coriander1/2 tsp dried ginger(I forgot to add in the video. lol)1/2 tsp fenugreek1/2 tsp cardamom1/2 nutmeg1/2 all spice1/4 cloveInstructions:1. soak chickpeas for 6 hours, then cook with pressure cooker for 5 min.2. toast sunflower seeds.3. put all the ingredients for berbere spice except for nutmeg in a grinder then make it into powder. add grated nutmeg.4. combine all the ingredients together in a food processor and process. add water if needed.5. serve with pita or whatever you like ;)-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」サンフラワーシード（生）　80gひよこ豆　200g(茹でたら550g)オリーブオイル　大さじ２レモンの皮　レモン１個分レモン果汁　大さじ３ハラペーニョ　小さじ１（オプショナル）ベルベルスパイス　小さじ1〜2にんにく　2つ塩　小さじ1◎ベルベルスパイス◎チリパウダー　大さじ1〜2（唐辛子１０g）パプリカパウダー　大さじ2塩　小さじ1コリアンダーパウダー　小さじ1ジンジャーパウダー　小さじ1/2（動画では入れ忘れました。笑）フェヌグリークパウダー　小さじ1/2カルダモンパウダー　小さじ1/2ナツメグパウダー　小さじ1/2オールスパイスパウダー　小さじ1/2クローブパウダー　小さじ1/4「作り方」１、ひよこ豆を６時間浸水してから圧力鍋で５分ほど圧をかけます。２、サンフラワーシードを炒ります。３、ベルベルスパイスミックスのナツメグ以外の材料を全てミルサーで粉状にします。削ったナツメグを最後に加えます。４、全ての材料をフードプロセッサーで撹拌します。水を加えてテクスチャーを調整してください。５、ピタパンで食べると美味しいよ！（ピタパンは全体に水を吹きかけてからトースターで焼くと焼きたてみたいになります♪・・・知ってるか。笑）-----------------------------------------------------------------------I Teriyaki Bowl (vegan) ☆ 照り焼き丼の作り方,"Apr 15, 2017",6512,99,149984,"Vegan Soy Textured BEEF SLICEhttp://amzn.to/2oxWxui (US)ブラウンシュガーファースト 有機アップルソースhttp://amzn.to/2oLYBkV (JP)かるなぁ 大豆まるごとミート スライスタイプhttp://amzn.to/2oe3Lmt (JP)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:1 tbsp kudzu powder (other kind of starch can be substitution)4 tbsp soy sauce120g water80g apple sauce50g soy meata clove of garlic10g ginger2 tbsp sesame oil300g onion100g maitake mushroomand your choice of rice, steamed or grilled vegetables and some lettuce.Instructions:1. combine kudzu, soy sauce, water and apple sauce.2. boil soy meat then strain.3. fry garlic, ginger and onion. add soy meat and teriyaki sauce. keep heating until teriyaki sauce thickens.4. put rice, lettuce and cooked vegetables in a bowl, then put teriyaki on top.-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : Lemon Poppyseed Muffins (vegan) ☆ レモンポピーシードマフィンの作り方,"Apr 7, 2017",6737,65,623272,"遠藤商事 ブリキマフィン型http://amzn.to/2p8PgAf (JP)Microplane ミディアムゼスター MP-051http://amzn.to/2o9SNRv (JP)ブラウンシュガーファースト 有機アップルソースhttp://amzn.to/2oLYBkV (JP)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:300g all purpose flour230g apple sauce300g coconut milkzest and juice of 2 lemons2 tbsp poppyseed1 tbsp baking powder Instructions:1. combine all the ingredients together in a bowl.2. mix the mixture and pour it into a baking tin.3. bake at 350F/180C for 30 min*this recipe is super healthy. If you want to bake normal vegan muffins, try the recipe below.300g all purpose flour70g oil (it doesn't matter what kind of oil you use. but try to use less flavor one.)150g sweetener (liquid sweetener is easier to make but...who cares.)300g coconut milkzest and juice of 2 lemons2 tbsp poppyseed1 tbsp baking powder -----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」薄力粉　300gアップルソース　225gココナッツミルク　300gレモンの皮  2個分レモン果汁  2個分ポピーシード　大さじ２ベーキングパウダー　大さじ１「作り方」１、全ての材料をボウルに入れて軽く混ぜます。２、マフィン型に流し入れます。３、180℃で30分焼きます。※かなりヘルシーなヒッピーマフィンですので、通常の体に悪い（笑）マフィンを作りたい方は下記材料で作ってくださいね。薄力粉　300gオイル　70g（味と香りにクセのないものを選んでください）甘味料　150g（種類は問いません。液体の方が作りやすいかな）ココナッツミルク　300gレモンの皮  2個分レモン果汁  2個分ポピーシード　大さじ２ベーキングパウダー　大さじ１-----------------------------------------------------------------------Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.comFacebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro RycoteMonitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7 / RSS TP-243 Ground-Level TripodSoftware : Adobe Premiere Pro CCMusic : A Moment of Clarity by Shaun Frearson (https://www.premiumbeat.com/royalty_f...)-----------------------------------------------------------------------"

Lemon Curd Tart (vegan) ☆ レモンカードタルトの作り方,"Mar 27, 2017",18650,183,690404,"Microplane 40020 Classic Zester/Graterhttp://amzn.to/2o09jnT (U.S.)CHEMION - Unique Bluetooth LED Glasseshttp://amzn.to/2ncgu8I (U.S.)other Ingredients & tool listhttp://www.peacefulcuisine.com/shopus/Microplane プレミアム ゼスターグレーターhttp://amzn.to/2o0m2qn (JP)Chemion LEDスマートグラスhttp://amzn.to/2mKRyJo (JP)オーガニックアーモンドhttp://sunfoodsuperfoods.jp/?pid=9894... (JP)使用機材＆食材リストhttp://www.peacefulcuisine.com/shop-jp/-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:for the lemon curd:400g coconut milk 100g lemon juice2 tbsp  lemon zest80g sugar40g tapioca starch(it doesn't have to be tapioca)for the tart crust:100g rolled oats 100g garbanzo flour(You could use any kind of other flour like wheat flour, rice flour etc)40g almonds60g oil60g maple syrupdried lemon & mint for garnish*I sliced lemon 2mm thick and put them in dehydrator for over 18 hours at 125F/52C*If you don't like the slimy texture of the lemon curd, try to use 20g tapioca starch and 1/2 tsp agar powder instead of using 40g tapioca starch.Instructions:1. put all the ingredients of lemon curd and gently heat it up over low heat until it brings to boil. keep stirring.2. strain the mixture with strainer.3. combine all the ingredients of tart crust in food processor. run food processor until mixture is kind of sticky. push the mixture hard into a small tin. bake for 20 minutes at 350F/180C.4. pour the lemon curd mixture into a tart crust, garnish with dried lemon and mint.-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」☆レモンカード☆ココナッツミルク　１缶（400ml）レモン汁　100gレモンの皮　大さじ2きび砂糖　80gタピオカ澱粉　40g（タピオカでなくても構いません。）☆タルト☆オーツ　100gひよこ豆粉　100g（小麦粉や米粉など、なんでも代用OKです。）アーモンド　40gオイル　60gメープルシロップ　60gドライレモンミント「作り方」１、レモンカードの材料を全て混ぜてとろみがつくまで火にかけます。舌触りをよくしたい場合は裏ごしします。２、タルト生地の材料を全てフードプロセッサーにかけます。３、型に敷き詰め、180℃で20分ほど焼きます。４、レモンカードをタルトに入れ、飾り付けしたら完成です。※レモンカードのモチモチした感じが好きでない場合は、タピオカ澱粉40gの代わりに粉寒天小さじ1/2とタピオカ澱粉20gで代用すると良いと思います。※ドライレモンは、レモンを2mm厚にスライスしてディハイドレーターで52℃で18時間ほど乾燥させました。-----------------------------------------------------------------------Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko [No Music] How to make Lemon Curd Tart,"Mar 27, 2017",9533,84,325639,"Microplane 40020 Classic Zester/Graterhttp://amzn.to/2o09jnT (U.S.)CHEMION - Unique Bluetooth LED Glasseshttp://amzn.to/2ncgu8I (U.S.)other Ingredients & tool listhttp://www.peacefulcuisine.com/shopus/Microplane プレミアム ゼスターグレーターhttp://amzn.to/2o0m2qn (JP)Chemion LEDスマートグラスhttp://amzn.to/2mKRyJo (JP)オーガニックアーモンドhttp://sunfoodsuperfoods.jp/?pid=9894... (JP)使用機材＆食材リストhttp://www.peacefulcuisine.com/shop-jp/-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:for the lemon curd:400g coconut milk 100g lemon juice2 tbsp  lemon zest80g sugar40g tapioca starch(it doesn't have to be tapioca)for the tart crust:100g rolled oats 100g garbanzo flour(You could use any kind of other flour like wheat flour, rice flour etc)40g almonds60g oil60g maple syrupdried lemon & mint for garnish*I sliced lemon 2mm thick and put them in dehydrator for over 18 hours at 125F/52C*If you don't like the slimy texture of the lemon curd, try to use 20g tapioca starch and 1/2 tsp agar powder instead of using 40g tapioca starch.Instructions:1. put all the ingredients of lemon curd and gently heat it up over low heat until it brings to boil. keep stirring.2. strain the mixture with strainer.3. combine all the ingredients of tart crust in food processor. run food processor until mixture is kind of sticky. push the mixture hard into a small tin. bake for 20 minutes at 350F/180C.4. pour the lemon curd mixture into a tart crust, garnish with dried lemon and mint.-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often Basil Walnut Ravioli (vegan) ☆ バジルと胡桃のラビオリの作り方,"Mar 14, 2017",17110,186,465863,"Imperia Pasta Maker Machine (U.S.)http://amzn.to/2mY7kzwNorpro Stainless Steel Dual Wheel Ravioli Pastry Pizza Crimper Cutter Slicer(U.S.)http://amzn.to/2mqnBctインペリア新型パスタマシーンSP-150(JP)http://amzn.to/2nlUz2qWMF ラビオリカッター(JP)http://amzn.to/2lYFGmx-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:for the dough:400g semolina flour (all purpose flour or bread flour can be substitution)40g olive oil1/2 tsp salt180g waterfor the filling:200g onion a clove of garlic2 tbsp olive oil80g walnut10g basil1/2 tsp saltarugula, pine nuts, pepper and olive oil for garnishInstructions:1. put all the ingredients for the dough together in a bowl and knead a little bit.2. roll the dough out and flatten with pasta machine.3. fry onion and garlic until golden brown and put them in food processor with all other ingredients for the filling and make it smooth but not too much.4. put the filling between the dough, cut them into pieces.5. boil ravioli for 1 - 2 minutes.-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」パスタ生地セモリナ粉　400g（中力粉か強力粉で代用できます）オリーブオイル　40g水　180g塩　小さじ1/2フィリング玉ねぎ　200gにんにく　1片胡桃　80gバジル　10g塩　小さじ1/2飾り付けルッコラ、胡椒、オリーブオイル、松の実「作り方」１、パスタ生地の材料を全て混ぜ、ひとまとまりにしてます。２、パスタマシンで平たく伸ばしておきます。３、玉ねぎとにんにくを炒め、残りの材料と一緒にフードプロセッサーにかけます。４、フィリングを生地で挟んで、カッターで切り分けます。５、１〜２分茹でたら盛り付けて完成です。-----------------------------------------------------------------------Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro RycoteMonitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Software : Adobe Premiere Pro CC-----------------------------------------------------------------------"

Acai Ice Cream (vegan) ☆ アサイーアイスクリームの作り方,"Feb 16, 2017",16832,151,614741,"I miss Acai bowl that I ate in Hawaii, so I made this just for me. lol-----------------------------------------------------------------------Cuisinart ICE-30BC Frozen Yogurt, Sorbet, and Ice Cream Makerhttp://amzn.to/2ld19Vhクイジナートアイスクリームメーカー ICE-30BChttp://amzn.to/2kPlrTM-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:400g rice milk (any other kind of milk can be substitution.)400g banana100g dates (doesn't have to be dates.)120g cashew nuts10g coconut Oil (you can skip this)40g acai powderInstructions:1. blend all the ingredients with a high power blender.2. put the mixture into an ice cream maker. it normally takes 15 - 20 minutes.3. leave the mixture in a freezer for a couple of hours.-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」ライスミルク400g（他のミルクでも構いません）バナナ400gカシューナッツ120gデーツ100g（他の甘味料で代用できます）ココナッツオイル10g（なくても大丈夫です。風味が好きなだけです。笑）アサイーパウダー40g（量は好みで増減してください。）「作り方」１、すべての材料をハイパワーのブレンダーでよく撹拌する。２、アイスクリームメーカーに流し入れる。固まるまでに15〜20分くらいかかります。３、冷凍庫で数時間ほどさらに凍らせます。オーガニック アサイー パウダーhttp://sunfoodsuperfoods.jp/?pid=6602...オーガニック ローカシューナッツhttp://sunfoodsuperfoods.jp/?pid=7849...オーガニック エキストラバージン ココナッツオイルhttp://sunfoodsuperfoods.jp/?pid=7508...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro RycoteMonitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Software : Adobe Premiere Pro CC-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
Chocolate Granola Bars (vegan) ☆ チョコレートグラノーラバーの作り方,"Feb 3, 2017",18124,127,2056353,I can't stop eating this! Help!! lol-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:For the granola bars:60g coconut oil120g maple syrup200g old fashioned oats100g rice flour100g hazelnuts60g mulberries60g raisinsFor the chocolate layer:50g cacao butter100g coconut oil120g maple syrup120g cacao powderInstructions:1. break oats into small pieces with food processor. cut hazelnuts into small pieces as well.2. put all the ingredients for granola together and mix well. put the mixture into a tin and push it down a little bit.3. bake 350F/180C for 30 minutes.4. cut cacao butter into small pieces then put it into a pan. add coconut oil and gently heat it up until it dissolve.5. add cacao powder and maple syrup then stir well.6. pour the chocolate mixture over the granola.7. leave it in a fridge for 1 hour.-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」　※ちょいと甘めのレシピです。ココナッツオイル　60gメープルシロップ　120gオーツ　200g米粉　100gヘーゼルナッツ　100gマルベリー　60gレーズン　60gカカオバター　50gココナッツオイル　100gメープルシロップ　120gカカオパウダー　120g「作り方」１、オーツをフードプロセッサーで細かくします。グラノーラの残りの材料と合わせてよく混ぜます。２、型に敷き詰め180℃で30分焼きます。３、カカオバターとココナッツオイルを弱火にかけて溶かします。４、カカオパウダーとメープルシロップを加え、よく混ぜてからグラノーラの上に流し入れます。５、冷蔵庫で１時間冷やしたら出来上がりです。-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro RycoteMonitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Software : Adobe Premiere Pro CC-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Homemade Kim Chee (vegan) ☆ 自家製ヴィーガンキムチの作り方,"Jan 11, 2017",53552,915,16259564,This is my very first attempt to make kim chee myself and this tastes really nice! I'm so satisfied ;)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:2.5kg napa cabbage150g salt250g daikon radish (julianne)100g apple (grated)30g chinese chives (chopped into an inch long)30g garlic (grated)30g ginger (grated)50g sweetener5g kombu (thinly cut or sliced) 150g korean chili powder (Don't use normal chili powder. it's too hot to use.)200g water20g glutinous rice fllourInstructions:1. sprinkle salt between napa cabbage leaves and put a weight until water come out. flip over if necessary.2. put water and glutinous rice flour together and heat it until it thickens.3. put all the ingredients for seasoning together and pour glutinous rice mixture. mix well.4. rinse napa cabbage thoroughly.5. spread kim chee paste on every napa cabbage leaves.6. put it in a container and let it sit for a day.7. keep in a fridge and eat up within 30 days or so. -----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」白菜　2.5kg塩　150g韓国産唐辛子　150gりんご　100g（すりおろし）甘味料　50gニラ　30gにんにく　30g（すりおろし）生姜　30g（すりおろし）昆布　5g（細長く切る）水　200g白玉粉　20g「作り方」１、白菜に塩をたっぷり塗り、重りを乗せて浅漬けにします。途中、ひっくり返すと早くできます。２、水と白玉粉を鍋に入れてとろみがつくまで火にかけます。３、２とキムチペーストの材料を準備して全て混ぜ合わせます。４、白菜を水洗いします。５、白菜にキムチペーストを塗り込みます。６、容器に入れて常温で1日置きます。７、そのあとは冷蔵庫で保存し、30日以内くらいに食べ切るようにします。（徐々に発酵してきて酸味が強くなってきます）-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro RycoteMonitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Slider : Libec ALX S8 KITSoftware : Adobe Premiere Pro CC-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Homemade Chickpea Miso ☆ ひよこ豆味噌の作り方,"Jan 4, 2017",6774,70,143859,Kuvings C7000S Whole Slow Juicer Elitehttps://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01...クビンス サイレントジューサーJSG-641Mhttps://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:1000g chickpeas1000g koji400g saltInstructions:1. soak chickpeas overnight then cook until it softens.2. mash chickpeas. mix with koji and salt.3. put the mixture into a bucket or container.4. leave in a cool dark place for at least 6 months.-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often use iHerb to get organic ingredients.HP : http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a code YOY970 to get a discount on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price sometimes even free :)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」ひよこ豆　1kg麹　1kg塩　400g「作り方」１、ひよこ豆を一晩浸水し、柔らかくなるまで茹でます。２、ひよこ豆を潰します。３、潰したひよこ豆と麹と塩を混ぜます。４、容器に空気がなるべく入らないように入れていきます。５、最低半年くらいは冷暗所で保管します。-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE VideoMic Pro RycoteMonitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Software : Adobe Premiere Pro CC / FilmConvert-----------------------------------------------------------------------

[No Music] How to make Boiled Dumplings,"Dec 7, 2016",88580,1109,1645670,"Bob Kramer 10"" Stainless Damascus Chef's Knife by Zwilling J.A. Henckelshttps://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00...ボブ・クレーマー　ユーロステンレス　包丁セットhttps://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B...https://jp.zwilling-shop.com/jp/By-Ma...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:For the filling:200g cabbage1/2tsp salt100g onion10g ginger3 cloves of garlic20g chinese chives10g dried shiitakeFor the dough:200g all purpose flour110g hot water (adjust the amount of water if needed)For the sauce:2 tbsp soy sauce1 tbsp vinegar1 tsp toasted sesame oil10g green onion1 tbsp toasted sesame seeds1 tsp chili bean paste (optional)1 tsp sweet soybean paste (optional)Instructions:1. sprinkle salt over cabbage and wait until water come out.2. soak dried shiitake for 10 minutes or so.3. mince all the vegetables for the filling and put together.4. make the dough. divide the dough into small pieces.(13g each)5. warp the filling.6. boil the dumplings for 2 - 3 minutes.-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often order organic foods from iHerb.Check out their HP below.http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a Code YOY970 to get up to $10.00 off on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price.-----------------------------------------------------------------------Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------【材料】約25個分キャベツ　200g塩　小さじ1/2玉ねぎ　100gニラ　20g生姜　10gにんにく　3つ干し椎茸　10g中力粉　200gお湯　110g（お湯の量は調整してください）醤油　大さじ2酢　大さじ1ごま油　小さじ1炒りごま　大さじ1万能ネギ　10g豆板醤　小さじ1（お好みで）甜麺醤　小さじ1（お好みで）【作り方】１、キャベツに塩をふってしんなりするまで置いておきます。２、干し椎茸を浸水しておきます。３、具の材料を全てみじん切りにして合わせておきます。４、皮を作ります。中力粉とお湯を混ぜ、一つ13gくらいに切り分けます。５、具を包みます。６、水餃子を茹でます。途中、お湯が沸騰したら差し水をしても良いです。（その方が気持ちモッチリします。）茹で時間は２分くらいです。-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro RycoteMonitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Software : Adobe Premiere Pro CC-----------------------------------------------------------------------"

Pad Thai (vegan) ☆ パッタイの作り方,"Nov 25, 2016",23693,439,285153,"No music version of this video is below:)https://youtu.be/UyaYhxQQKXY-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:100g rice noodles(soak 10 - 30 minutes beforehand)50g oniona clove of garlic200g firm tofu or deep fried tofu20g garlic chives3 tbsp oil20g tamarind paste4 - 6 tbsp soy sauce1 - 2 palm sugarwater as needed50g bean sproutsroasted peanutslime wedgesInstructions:1. soak rice noodles for 10 - 30 minutes.2. fry garlic and onion. add tofu and seasonings.3. put rice noodles into the pan and gently keep heating until the noodles get softens. add water as needed.4. add bean sprouts and garlic chives.5. garnish with peanuts and lime wedges.-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients in this recipe are:Eden Foods, Organic, Shoyu Soy Saucehttp://www.iherb.com/Eden-Foods-Organ...Sunfood, Coconut Palm Sugarhttp://www.iherb.com/Sunfood-Indonesi...Annie Chun's, Pad Thai, Brown Rice Noodleshttp://www.iherb.com/Annie-Chun-s-Pad...-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often order organic foods from iHerb.Check out their HP below.http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a Code YOY970 to get up to $10.00 off on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price.-----------------------------------------------------------------------材料ライスヌードル　100gたまねぎ　50g木綿豆腐か厚揚げ　200gニラ　20gにんにく　一片オイル　大さじ3タマリンドペースト　20g醤油　大さじ　4〜6パームシュガー　1〜2水　必要に応じてもやし　50gピーナッツライム作り方１、ライスヌードルを10〜30分ほど浸水します。２、にんにくと玉ねぎを炒め、豆腐と調味料を加えます。３、ライスヌードルを加え、水気が足りないようなら水を足します。４、もやしとニラを加え火が通ったら器に盛ります。５、ピーナッツとライムを添えて出来上がり！-----------------------------------------------------------------------Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE Videomic Pro RycoteMonitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Software : Adobe Premiere Pro CCMusic : A Family Story / ARTiria Productions(http://www.premiumbeat.com/royalty_fr...)-----------------------------------------------------------------------"

[No Music] How to make Gomoku Okowa,"Nov 5, 2016",4310,47,319735,"Yes, I LOVE OKOWA~~~~;)a cloth I used to steam glutinous rice is cotton cloth. I guess you could use cheese cloth or something instead.中華セイロ（藤倉商店）僕が使用したのは内径20cmのものです。http://www.take-fujikura.com/category...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:3 cups(450g) glutinous rice (soak 6 - 12 hours, then drain 30 - 60 minutes before steaming)5g dried hijiki (soak for 10 minutes then drain)8g dried shiitake (soak with 200g water below. do not drain. keep the soaking water)200g water1 tbsp soy sauce2 tbsp mirin1/4 tsp salt50g carrot50g burdock1/2 tsp salt1 tbsp soy sauce2 tbsp sake100g water40g walnutInstructions:1. simmer carrot, burdock, hijiki and shiitake until water is gone.2. put 1/2 tsp salt, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 2 tbsp sake and 100g water into a pan and bring to a boil.3. steam glutinous rice for 10 minutes.4. take the rice out and put all the ingredients together and put it back to steamer and steam for another 15 minutes or until the rice is soft enough.5. spread the okowa on a tray and let it chill to prevent from getting too watery.-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often order organic foods from iHerb.Check out their HP below.http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a Code YOY970 to get up to $10.00 off on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price.-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」もち米　3合（6-12時間ほど浸水して、蒸す30-60分くらい前に水切りしておく）材料Ａ　ひじき　5g（水で戻しておく。）　干し椎茸　8g（下の200gの水と一緒に浸水する。戻し汁は捨てないように）　水　200g　醤油　大さじ１　みりん　大さじ２　塩　小さじ1/4　人参　50g　牛蒡　50g材料Ｂ　塩　小さじ1/2　醤油　大さじ1　酒　大さじ2　水　100gくるみ　40g「作り方」１、材料Ａを煮汁がなくなるまで煮る。２、材料Ｂを一度煮立たせておく。３、もち米を10分間蒸す。４、もち米を取り出し、すべての材料を混ぜ合わせる。５、15分間蒸す。６、バットなどに広げて冷ます。-----------------------------------------------------------------------Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE VideoMIc RycoteMonitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Software : Adobe Premiere Pro CC-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
Gomoku Okowa (Steamed Glutinous Rice with Vegetables)☆ 五目おこわの作り方,"Nov 5, 2016",4858,41,103454,"Yes, I LOVE OKOWA~~~~;)a cloth I used to steam glutinous rice is cotton cloth. I guess you could use cheese cloth or something instead.中華セイロ（藤倉商店）僕が使用したのは内径20cmのものです。http://www.take-fujikura.com/category...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:3 cups(450g) glutinous rice (soak 6 - 12 hours, then drain 30 - 60 minutes before steaming)5g dried hijiki (soak for 10 minutes then drain)8g dried shiitake (soak with 200g water below. do not drain. keep the soaking water)200g water1 tbsp soy sauce2 tbsp mirin1/4 tsp salt50g carrot50g burdock1/2 tsp salt1 tbsp soy sauce2 tbsp sake100g water40g walnutInstructions:1. simmer carrot, burdock, hijiki and shiitake until water is gone.2. put 1/2 tsp salt, 1 tbsp soy sauce, 2 tbsp sake and 100g water into a pan and bring to a boil.3. steam glutinous rice for 10 minutes.4. take the rice out and put all the ingredients together and put it back to steamer and steam for another 15 minutes or until the rice is soft enough.5. spread the okowa on a tray and let it chill to prevent from getting too watery.-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often order organic foods from iHerb.Check out their HP below.http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a Code YOY970 to get up to $10.00 off on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price.-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」もち米　3合（6-12時間ほど浸水して、蒸す30-60分くらい前に水切りしておく）材料Ａ　ひじき　5g（水で戻しておく。）　干し椎茸　8g（下の200gの水と一緒に浸水する。戻し汁は捨てないように）　水　200g　醤油　大さじ１　みりん　大さじ２　塩　小さじ1/4　人参　50g　牛蒡　50g材料Ｂ　塩　小さじ1/2　醤油　大さじ1　酒　大さじ2　水　100gくるみ　40g「作り方」１、材料Ａを煮汁がなくなるまで煮る。２、材料Ｂを一度煮立たせておく。３、もち米を10分間蒸す。４、もち米を取り出し、すべての材料を混ぜ合わせる。５、15分間蒸す。６、バットなどに広げて冷ます。-----------------------------------------------------------------------Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：RODE VideoMIc RycoteMonitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Software : Adobe Premiere Pro CCMusic :  sweet memories / Dan Phillipson (http://www.premiumbeat.com/royalty_fr...)-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
Macnut Vanilla Ice Cream (vegan) ☆ マカダミアナッツバニラアイスクリームの作り方,"Oct 25, 2016",8101,53,614741,"It's always so much fun to make ice cream at home ;) Enjoy!-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:200g macadamia nuts200g water400g coconut milk160g maple syrupa whole pod of vanilla beansInstructions:1. put everything into a container and blend well with high power blender.2. pour the mixture into ice cream maker.3. leave the ice cream in a freezer for a couple of hours.* if you have time and want smoother and creamy ice cream, here's another advanced recipe for you as macadamia nuts has rougher texture than cashews.200g madam nuts200g water400g coconut milk160g maple syrup30 - 50g vegetable oil(optional, if you want richer ice cream)a whole pod of vanilla beans1. make macadamia nut milk first with macadamia nuts, water and coconut milk.(blend these ingredients with blender then strain with mesh bag or nut milk bag)2. add maple syrup and vanilla.3. pour the mixture into an ice cream maker.4. leave it in a freezer for a couple of hours.-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often order organic foods from iHerb.Check out their HP below.http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a Code YOY970 to get up to $10.00 off on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price.-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」マカダミアナッツ　200g水　200gココナッツミルク　400gメープルシロップ　160gバニラビーンズ　1本分「作り方」１、すべての材料をブレンダーでよく撹拌し、アイスクリームメーカーでアイスクリームにします。２、冷凍庫で数時間冷凍したら出来上がり。※アイスクリームメーカーを使わないレシピはこちらを参考にしてみてください。Chocolate Ice Cream without an Ice-cream Maker (vegan) ☆ チョコレートアイスクリームの作り方 https://youtu.be/53hTbAwDudk※マカダミアナッツは少しザラッとした食感が残ります。さらにクリーミーなアイスにしたい場合は、マカダミアナッツ、水、ココナッツミルクをブレンダーで撹拌してナッツミルクバッグなどで濾してから作ると良いです。この場合はリッチな食感にするために少し油分（香りの少ないオイルなど）を足しても良いと思います。オーガニック・メープルシロップ No.1 [No Music] How to make Macnut Vanilla Ice Cream,"Oct 25, 2016",11084,100,442023,"It's always so much fun to make ice cream at home ;) Enjoy!-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:200g macadamia nuts200g water400g coconut milk160g maple syrupa whole pod of vanilla beansInstructions:1. put everything into a container and blend well with high power blender.2. pour the mixture into ice cream maker.3. leave the ice cream in a freezer for a couple of hours.* if you have time and want smoother and creamy ice cream, here's another advanced recipe for you as macadamia nuts has rougher texture than cashews.200g madam nuts200g water400g coconut milk160g maple syrup30 - 50g vegetable oil(optional, if you want richer ice cream)a whole pod of vanilla beans1. make macadamia nut milk first with macadamia nuts, water and coconut milk.(blend these ingredients with blender then strain with mesh bag or nut milk bag)2. add maple syrup and vanilla.3. pour the mixture into an ice cream maker.4. leave it in a freezer for a couple of hours.-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often order organic foods from iHerb.Check out their HP below.http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a Code YOY970 to get up to $10.00 off on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price.-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」マカダミアナッツ　200g水　200gココナッツミルク　400gメープルシロップ　160gバニラビーンズ　1本分「作り方」１、すべての材料をブレンダーでよく撹拌し、アイスクリームメーカーでアイスクリームにします。２、冷凍庫で数時間冷凍したら出来上がり。※アイスクリームメーカーを使わないレシピはこちらを参考にしてみてください。Chocolate Ice Cream without an Ice-cream Maker (vegan) ☆ チョコレートアイスクリームの作り方 https://youtu.be/53hTbAwDudk※マカダミアナッツは少しザラッとした食感が残ります。さらにクリーミーなアイスにしたい場合は、マカダミアナッツ、水、ココナッツミルクをブレンダーで撹拌してナッツミルクバッグなどで濾してから作ると良いです。この場合はリッチな食感にするために少し油分（香りの少ないオイルなど）を足しても良いと思います。オーガニック・メープルシロップ No.1 ミディアム 1Lhttp://bit.ly/2tvxrBNマカダミアナッツ（生） 1Kghttp://bit.ly/2u4UeBwCuisinart クイジナートアイスクリームメーカー ICE-30BChttp://amzn.to/2kPlrTM-----------------------------------------------------------------------Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mm / GENUS ECLIPSE 77mm ND Fader Filter Mic：RODE VideoMic RycoteMonitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Software : Adobe Premiere Pro CC-----------------------------------------------------------------------"

Pecan Pie (vegan) collab with SweetPotatoSoul ☆ ピーカンパイの作り方,"Oct 3, 2016",5764,56,2179931,"collab video Jenné made is here ;)Vegan Dorayaki Japanese Pancakeshttps://youtu.be/Dxe0Prk5oIMI didn't use tofu ice cream in this video but you can make and use this recipe;)Tofu ice cream (vegan) ☆ 豆腐のアイスクリーム https://youtu.be/s6UHei76xt8-----------------------------------------------------------------------使用している機材・キッチン道具・食材リスト --- http://www.peacefulcuisine.com/shop-jp/My gear, kitchen equipments and ingredients list --- http://www.peacefulcuisine.com/shopus/Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients (makes 7 inch square tin) :For the crust :120g whole pastry flour30g maple syrup30g oil (i used untoasted sesame oil)For the filling :70g cashew nuts150g coconut milk (can substitute with any other milk)30g bourbon (you can skip this)60g brown rice syrup (any sweetener is okay to use)40g coconut sugar (any sweetener is okay to use)15g tapioca starch (you can use other kind of starch)2 tsp vanilla extract100g pecan nuts50g pecan nuts(for garnish on top)Instructions:1. put whole pastry flour, maple syrup and oil together and mix well.2. put the mixture into a cake tin and press the dough a little.3. blend all the ingredients of filling with food processor(or blender).4. add 100g pecan nuts then gently heat the mixture until thicken.5. pour the mixture into the cake tin. put additional pecan nuts on top.6. bake at 350F/180c for 30 minutes.-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients in this recipe are:Now Foods, Organic Maple Syruphttp://www.iherb.com/Now-Foods-Real-F...Navitas Naturals, Organic, Cashew Nutshttp://www.iherb.com/Navitas-Naturals...Lundberg, Sweet Dreams, Organic Brown Rice Syruphttp://www.iherb.com/Lundberg-Sweet-D...Big Tree Farms, Organic Coconut Palm Sugarhttp://www.iherb.com/Big-Tree-Farms-O...Edward & Sons, Organic Tapioca Starchhttp://www.iherb.com/Edward-Sons-Orga...Simply Organic, Pure Vanilla Extracthttp://www.iherb.com/Simply-Organic-P...-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often order organic foods from iHerb.Check out their HP below.http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a Code YOY970 to get up to $10.00 off on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price.-----------------------------------------------------------------------材料クラスト生地全粒薄力粉　120gメープルシロップ　30gオイル　30g（太白ごま油を使用しました）フィリングカシューナッツ　70gココナッツミルク　150gバーボン　30g玄米米飴　60gパームシュガー　40gタピオカ澱粉　15gバニラエクストラクト　小さじ2ピーカンナッツ　100g（フィリング用）ピーカンナッツ　50g（飾り用）作り方１、クラスト生地の材料を混ぜ合わせ、型に敷き詰める。２、フィリングの材料をフープロなどで撹拌する。３、ピーカンナッツ100gを加えてトロみがつくまで弱火にかける。４、型に流し入れ、飾りのピーカンナッツを乗せる。５、180℃で30分ほど焼いたら出来上がり。-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：SHURE VP83 Monitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Software : Adobe Premiere Pro CCMusic :  This is Love / Dan Phillipson(http://www.premiumbeat.com/royalty_fr...)-----------------------------------------------------------------------"

ingredients list --- http://www.peacefulcuisine.com/shopus/Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients (makes 7 inch square tin) :For the crust :120g whole pastry flour30g maple syrup30g oil (i used untoasted sesame oil)For the filling :70g cashew nuts150g coconut milk (can substitute with any other milk)30g bourbon (you can skip this)60g brown rice syrup (any sweetener is okay to use)40g coconut sugar (any sweetener is okay to use)15g tapioca starch (you can use other kind of starch)2 tsp vanilla extract100g pecan nuts50g pecan nuts(for garnish on top)Instructions:1. put whole pastry flour, maple syrup and oil together and mix well.2. put the mixture into a cake tin and press the dough a little.3. blend all the ingredients of filling with food processor(or blender).4. add 100g pecan nuts then gently heat the mixture until thicken.5. pour the mixture into the cake tin. put additional pecan nuts on top.6. bake at 350F/180c for 30 minutes.-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients in this recipe are:Now Foods, Organic Maple Baba Ganoush ☆ ババガヌーシュの作り方,"Sep 26, 2016",3715,24,125677,"I loved eating baba ganoush with aish(bread) while I was is Egypt.Hope you have fun with this recipe;)There's a no music version of this video. check that out;)[No Music] How to make Baba Ganoushhttps://youtu.be/srCNADh1ObY-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:500g eggplant50g tahini1 - 2 tbsp lemon juice1/2 tsp salta hint of cumin powdera clove of garlic10g parsleyolive oil(optional)Instructions:1. bake eggplant in oven for about 45 minutes at 350F/180C2. cut the eggplant in half lengthwise, scoop out eggplant flesh and mash with folk3. add lemon juice, tahini, salt, cumin and parsley. mix together.4. enjoy!-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients list in this recipe are:Kevala, Organic Sesame Tahinihttp://www.iherb.com/Kevala-Organic-S...Simply Organic, Cumin powderhttp://www.iherb.com/Simply-Organic-C...Himalania, Fine Pink Salthttp://www.iherb.com/Himalania-Fine-P...-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often order organic foods from iHerb.Check out their HP below.http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a Code YOY970 to get up to $10.00 off on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price.-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」ナス　500gタヒニ　50gレモン汁　大さじ1〜2塩　小さじ1/2クミンパウダー　少々パセリ　10gオリーブオイル　お好みで「作り方」１、ナスをオーブンで焼きます。１８０℃で４５分。２、スプーンなどで中身を取り出し、フォークなどで潰します。３、残りの材料を全て混ぜ合わせて出来上がり！-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：SHURE VP83 Monitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Software : Adobe Premiere Pro CCMusic : A Special Place/Dan Phillipson(http://www.premiumbeat.com/royalty_fr...)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------"

ハマちゃんエジプト日本語ガイド,"Sep 17, 2016",273,11,55514,僕たちが今回のエジプト旅行で大変お世話になったハマちゃんの紹介です。基本的にはどんなリクエストにも応えてくれます。カイロでしたら、午前中はエジプト考古学博物館に行って、ランチを食べてから（もちろんランチのリクエストも可能）ピラミッドとスフィンクスを見に行く、などの構成も自由にできます。僕たちがしたように、マンゴー食べたいからマンゴー屋さんに連れてってとか、帰りは空港まで送ってとか、本当にどんなリクエストにも応えてくれます。カイロだけではなく、ルクソールやアスワンの遺跡なども日本語でガイドすることもできます。航空券とホテルだけは自分で取って、あとはハマちゃんと相談しながら全てを決める、なんてのも良いかと思います。ハマちゃんは漢字も読めますので、気軽にFacebookページからメッセージを送ってみてくださいね〜！------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ハマちゃんエジプト日本語ガイドエジプトのギザ在住のモハメッドと申します。ハマちゃんと呼んでください。エジプト国内で日本語ガイドとして働いております。カイロ市内だけではなく、ルクソール、アスワンなど他の都市の観光もお任せください。美味しいエジプト料理が食べられるレストラン、伝統的な製法で作られた本物のエジプト産のお土産が買える場所など、一般的なツアーでは行かないような所にお連れすることも可能です。エジプトでの旅行が最高の思い出となるように、精一杯努力致しますので、どうぞお気軽になんでもご相談ください。ご連絡お待ちしております！ハマちゃん------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ハマちゃんエジプト日本語ガイドhttp://bit.ly/2d8nlQX (Facebookページ)------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Creme Banana Brulee (vegan) ☆ クレームバナナブリュレの作り方,"Sep 3, 2016",25687,380,319055,"Enjoy my way of vegan brulee featuring banana  ;)There's a no music version. check this out as well :)https://youtu.be/E8P4f0aJ-t0-----------------------------------------------------------------------イワタニ クッキングバーナー CJ CB-TC-CJhttp://amzn.to/2trU3Ci (JP)Iwatani Cooking Torch - Professional Culinary Butane Crème Brulee and Food Torch Burnerhttp://amzn.to/2tqoJo4 (US)-----------------------------------------------------------------------Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/peacefulcuis...Instagram：http://instagram.com/peaceful_cuisine/Website : http://www.peacefulcuisine.com2nd Channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/peaceful...-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients:100g banana200g coconut milk200g any vegan milk(I used soy milk)50g cane sugar30g tapioca starch(any other starch can be substitution)1/2 tsp agar powdera quarter piece of vanilla beans2 tsp cane sugar for garnishInstruction:1. eat banana. Enjoy!2. put all the ingredients together in a container and blend them well.3. transfer the mixture to a sauce pan and gently warm it up until it thickens.4. leave it in a fridge for an hour.5. sprinkle cane sugar on the surface and burn it with a burner.-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients in this recipe are:Edward & Sons, Organic Tapioca Starchhttp://www.iherb.com/Edward-Sons-Orga...Rapunzel, Organic Whole Cane Sugarhttp://www.iherb.com/Rapunzel-Organic...Now Foods, Real Food, Agar Powderhttp://www.iherb.com/Now-Foods-Real-F...Singing Dog Vanilla, Organic Gourmet Vanilla Beanshttp://www.iherb.com/Singing-Dog-Vani...-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often order organic foods from iHerb.Check out their HP below.http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a Code YOY970 to get up to $10.00 off on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price.-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」バナナ　100gココナッツミルク　200g豆乳　200gきび砂糖　50gタピオカ澱粉　30g粉寒天　小さじ1/2バニラビーンズ　1/4本きび砂糖　小さじ2「作り方」１、バナナ（分量外）を食べる。２、全ての材料をブレンダーにかける。３、鍋に移して弱火にかけ、とろみがつくまで火にかける。４、器に流し入れて冷蔵庫で１時間ほど冷やす。５、きび砂糖を表面に均一に広げてバーナーで焦げるまで炙ります。-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：SHURE VP83 Monitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Software : Adobe Premiere Pro CCMusic : Living On Mountain Time/Pete Morse(http://www.premiumbeat.com/royalty_fr...)-----------------------------------------------------------------------"

Enjoy!2. put all the ingredients together in a container and blend them well.3. transfer the mixture to a sauce pan and gently warm it up until it thickens.4. leave it in a fridge for an hour.5. sprinkle cane sugar on the surface and burn it with a burner.-----------------------------------------------------------------------Ingredients in this recipe are:Edward & Sons, Organic Tapioca Starchhttp://www.iherb.com/Edward-Sons-Orga...Rapunzel, Organic Whole Cane Sugarhttp://www.iherb.com/Rapunzel-Organic...Now Foods, Real Food, Agar Powderhttp://www.iherb.com/Now-Foods-Real-F...Singing Dog Vanilla, Organic Gourmet Vanilla Beanshttp://www.iherb.com/Singing-Dog-Vani...-----------------------------------------------------------------------I often order organic foods from iHerb.Check out their HP below.http://www.iherb.com/?rcode=YOY970Use a Code YOY970 to get up to $10.00 off on your first purchase.They ship internationally at low price.-----------------------------------------------------------------------「材料」バナナ　100gココナッツミルク　200g豆乳　200gきび砂糖　50gタピオカ澱粉　30g粉寒天　小さじ1/2バニラビーンズ　1/4本きび砂糖　小さじ2「作り方」１、バナナ（分量外）を食べる。２、全ての材料をブレンダーにかける。３、鍋に移して弱火にかけ、とろみがつくまで火にかける。４、器に流し入れて冷蔵庫で１時間ほど冷やす。５、きび砂糖を表面に均一に広げてバーナーで焦げるまで炙ります。-----------------------------------------------------------------------Equipments & etc:Camera : Sony A7RIILens : FE 35mm F1.4 ZA [SEL35F14Z]Lens Filter : Kenko variable NDX 82mmMic：SHURE VP83 Monitor : Atomos Ninja AssassinTripods：SLIK carbon 923 pro/ SLIK carbon 823 pro/ SLIK mini pro 7Software : Adobe Premiere Pro CC-----------------------------------------------------------------------"
